page.title: 17PLYGRND GAMES-MAINLY GIRLS
page.content: Seven different{skipping rhymes}e.g. Teddy Bear(TB),TB turn around,TB,TB touch the ground.TB,TB climb the stairs.TB,TB say your prayers.TB,TB turn off the light.TB,TB say goodnight 7{clapping rhymes}e.g.My boyfriend gave me apples, my boyfriend gave me pears,My boyfriend gave me X,X,X, (kissing sound)and threw me down the stairs I gave him back his apples,I gave him back his pears, I gave him back his X,X,X,and threw him down the stairs.I threw him over China I threw him over France.I threw him over Mexico and saw his underpants. 8{Game {rhymes}e.g.Orange balls,orange balls here we go again.The last one to sit down is out.5{ball games}e.g.down on one knee.Ball is thrown to each other. If dropped person goes on one knee then 2 knees,l elbow,2 elbows,leye,2 eyes,out.2{chase games}Acky & Tig.
